Lee McCracken, who serves on the companyâ€™s Board of Directors, has over twenty years of life sciences experience spanning novel high-value diagnostics, specialty pharmaceuticals, and platform technologies in both private and public companies. He joined Pathwork following seven years as Corporate Head Of Business Development at Prometheus Laboratories. Prior to being acquired by Nestle Health Sciences in 2011, Prometheus grew to over $500 million in revenues by pioneering a differentiated “Rx/Dx” business model in both gastroenterology and oncology.
Prior to Prometheus, Mr. McCracken served as Senior Vice President of Pharmaceutical Business Development at Diversa Corporation. Earlier in his career, he served in leadership roles with GenStar Therapeutics, CombiChem, and Allergan Americas. Before moving into operating and corporate development roles in the life sciences, Mr. McCracken was a venture capitalist with 3i Capital and Union Venture.
